title: Mario Gabelli ‘Likely’ to Tender Warner Bros. to Paramount
description: Money manager Mario Gabelli said it’s “highly likely” he will tender his clients’ Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. shares to Paramount Skydance Corp. in an effort to spark a bidding war for the film and TV company.
content: Money manager Mario Gabelli said it’s “highly likely” he will tender his clients’ Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. shares to Paramount Skydance Corp. in an effort to spark a bidding war for the film and TV company.
